Intro

Helen Tran

Product Designer & Serial Student

I spend my days @Shopify looking at how we can change the future of commerce. I primarily focus on our relationships with developers and build products to make them stronger.

In my spare-time, I am usually trapped in a book somewhere or working on a side project.
